term.longtitle: IUPAC Gold Book - out-of-plane bending coordinate, in molecular geometry
term.title: out-of-plane bending coordinate

item.text: Given by Δ θ i- j k l = Δ z j r e i j si denotes [image: Not defined] the angle between the bonds ik and il, Δ z j the perpendicular distance of the atom j from the instantaneous plane ikl and r e i j the equilibrium length of the bond ij.

item.alttext: Δ θ i- j k l = Δ z j r e i j si

sources.item: PAC, 1978, 50, 1707. 'Definition and Symbolism of Molecular Force Constants' on page 1710 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac197850111707)
